ref: 7618 *pakk ʻ move forward, reach ʼ. [Loss of final syllables and of -- m -- in K. would make derivation from prákramati doubtful. Pk. paccala -- ʻ sufficient, able ʼ suggests connection with pakvá -- ]
Pk. pakka -- ʻ reached, sufficient, able ʼ, pakkaṇa -- ʻ able ʼ;
K. pakun ʻ to go, tread, advance, go on well, succeed ʼ;
Or. pakāibā ʻ to make move, throw, throw away, place, put ʼ; --
B. pāk ʻ bend, twist, eddy, rounds of a field in ploughing ʼ?
B. pāk ʻ bend, twist, eddy, rounds of a field in ploughing ʼ?
